Instruction: Soak cedar plank in water for at least 1 hour.
Combine maple syrup, soy sauce, Dijon mustard, garlic powder, and ginger in a small bowl.
Pat salmon fillet dry with paper towels.
Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Place salmon skin-side down on soaked cedar plank.
Place cedar plank on preheated grill, close lid, and cook for 15-20 minutes, or until salmon reaches desired doneness.
Baste salmon with remaining glaze halfway through cooking.
